front.title: Authentication Between Mobile Node and Home Agent

abstract.t: Mobile IPv6 relies on IPsec for securing the signaling between the MN and HA. However, the tight coupling of the mobility protocol with IPsec is detrimental to broader implementation and deployment. This document proposes a scheme based on Identity-Based Cryptography mechanism to authenticate the mobile node and signaling of home biding update to home agent. Hence, the use of IPsec could be avoided.
